nodes.text: Dobido was the smaller of Sernpidal's two moons. It measured twenty kilometers in diameter and was covered with large cities all over the surface.

The Praetorite Vong, employing the Yo'gand's Core tactic, used a dovin basal to pull it into Sernpidal, destroying both. Millions, including the Wookiee Chewbacca, were killed when Dobido collided with the planet, stripping its atmosphere and smashing much of Sernpidal's northern hemisphere loose.
